proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file components/revenueDashboard.html with this complete content:
-- The compiled JS file from your frontend component template will go here after transpiling and bundling using a tool like Webpack or Parcel, but you're instructed not to use markdown code blocks so the script tag is at this point in HTML This is for opportunity: Rapid Business Duplication Consulting Make sure the file is complete, working, and production-ready.
risks: Slow failure: unnoticed degradation accumulating by 2028-01-01
Unintended consequence: incentives shift toward short-term metrics, long-term reliability decays
Incentive drift: stakeholders habituate to optimistic outputs, raising risk of silent defects
mitigations: Add scheduled adversarial audits with hard pass/fail gates
Track leading indicators for drift and trust inflation; alert on trend change
Prefer reversible rollouts; keep rollback artifacts warm and tested
